result.execSummary:
The defendant Zachary J Norton was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court sentences the Defendant to pay a fine of $100 + costs = $579 + $94.50 drug surcharge + $25 drug testing fee = $698.50, due in $25 incriments per month, beginning 6/15/16 and on the 15th day of the month until paid in full. Non-payment results in a 14 day jail term, with Huber privileges consecutive. 

To submit a DNA Sample

No driver license suspension

6/2/16: Per Court Order: Reduce amount ordered by taking off $94.50.

ADDRESS INFO for Zachary J Norton
Current: W291 N978 Churchview Dr, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States  (Effective: 05-03-2017)
Prior: 1118 Arcadian Ave, Waukesha, WI 53186 United States
Please reduce amount ordered by taking off $94.50.

Case called at 2:36 pm [Clerk SH] (Case was scheduled for STC)
[Reserve Judge Robert Mawdsley presiding for BrIV]
Defendant Zachary J Norton in court with Attorney Elizabeth F Svehlek. ADA Jeffrey Martin Shock appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

Constitutional rights given; plea of "Guilty" entered; factual basis stipulated; victim rights compliance verified; Court finds the plea has been entered freely, voluntarily, intelligently and accepts the plea, finds Defendant guilty, and orders JOC entered.

Court sentences the Defendant to pay a fine of $100 + costs = $579 + $94.50 drug surcharge + $25 drug testing fee = $698.50, due in $25 incriments per month, beginning 6/15/16 and on the 15th day of the month until paid in full. Non-payment results in a 14 day jail term, with Huber privileges consecutive. 
To submit a DNA Sample
No driver license suspension
Recess: 2:44 pm
Status conference on May 27, 2016 at 02:30 pm.
Pre-trial conference on April 20, 2016 at 09:20 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Zachary J Norton
Current: 1118 Arcadian Ave, Waukesha, WI 53186 United States  (Effective: 04-08-2016)
Prior: W291 N978 Churchview Drive, Waukesha, WI 53188 United States

Case called at 10:30am [mo]
Defendant Zachary J Norton in court with Attorney Elizabeth F Svehlek.   ADA Monica Hall appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  
Defendant verifies that the date of birth and address listed on the Criminal Complaint are correct. 
Service of Complaint admitted, reading waived, the charge and maximum penalties are recited.
The Court finds probable cause to exist in the Criminal Complaint. 
Plea of "not guilty" entered; speedy trial waived by the Defendant

The Court requires $250  signature bond, with conditions: 
--no possession of drug paraphernalia without a valid prescription
--no possession or ingestion of any controlled substance without a valid prescription
--Booking at JESO today

recess:10:32am


NEXT:  (1) Pretrial Conference on 4/20/16 at 9:20am    (2)  Status Conference on 5/27/16 at 2:30pm
Initial appearance on April 8, 2016 at 10:30 am.

To Defense's Motion for Substitution of Judge:

The Court concludes the request is timely and in proper from. The Court directs the Clerk to request the assignment of another Judge under Wis. Stat. 751.03
